description: Mount Work is one of the tallest mountains in the CRD. The trails are well marked and the terrain is not very technical. Great day hike, beautiful views near the top of the mountain and down by the water. The GPS route includes a loop down to Mckenzie Bight via the Mckenzie Bight trail and then back up via the Cascade trail, which is very steep but there are steps built into the terrain.
directions: From Downtown Victoria:Head west on Yates St toward Trans-Canada Hwy/BC-1 SUse the right 2 lanes to turn right at the 1st cross street onto Trans-Canada Hwy/BC-1 NTake exit 10 toward View Royal/ColwoodKeep right at the fork, follow signs for Burnside Road WSlight right onto Burnside Rd WTurn left onto Prospect Lake RdContinue straight onto Munn RdThe parking lot will be on the right hand side of the road.
title: Mckenzie Bight Via Mount Work
